qas.question: Where are the semi finals played?

answers.text: e semi-finals have been played exclusively at the rebuilt Wembley Stadium

qas.question: Is there a name for the specific venue?

answers.text: Kennington Oval was used as the semi-final venue

qas.question: Where did the semi finals take place before then?

answers.text: semi-finals were played at high-capacity neutral venues around England

qas.question: What was the top most used venue?
Where was the cup held in 2005?

answers.text: In 2005, both were held at the Millennium Stadium.

qas.question: Where are the semi-finals never played?
In which decade was The Kennington Oval not used as a semi-final venue?

plausible_answers.text: Villa Park in Birmingham (55 times), Hillsborough in Sheffield (34 times) and Old Trafford in Manchester (23 times)

qas.question: What were the three least used venues?
How many times was The Kennington Oval used for semi-finals between 1991 and 2000?

plausible_answers.text: chosen to be roughly equidistant between the two teams for fairness of travel

qas.question: How were stadiums chosen from 1991 to 2000?

context: Th<a0_0>e semi-finals have been played exclusively at the rebuilt <b5_0>Wembley Stadium<b5_0/><a0_0/> since 2008, one year after it opened and after it had already hosted a final (in 2007). For <b6_0>the first<b6_0/> decade of the competition, the <a1_0>Kennington Oval was used as the semi-final venue<a1_0/>. In the period between this first decade and the reopening of Wembley, <a2_0>semi-finals were played at high-capacity neutral venues around England<a2_0/>; usually the home grounds of teams not involved in that semi-final, <b9_0>chosen to be roughly equidistant between the two teams for fairness of travel<b9_0/>. The top three most used venues in this period were <a3_0><b7_0>Villa Park in Birmingham (55 times)<a3_0/>, Hillsborough in Sheffield (34 times) and Old Trafford in Manchester (23 times)<b7_0/>. The original Wembley Stadium was also used <b8_0>seven<b8_0/> times for semi-final, between 1991 and 2000 (the last held there), but not always for fixtures featuring London teams. <a4_0>In 2005, both were held at the Millennium Stadium.
